mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM customer WHERE segment_id IN (2, 3, 5, 7)
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT customer_id) FROM customer_churn_snapshot WHERE snapshot_month = #{snapshotMonth} AND is_churn_risk = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT A.cum_id, MIN(A.start_date) AS first_dt FROM contract A GROUP BY A.cum_id) B WHERE B.first_dt >= #{from} AND B.first_dt < #{to}

SELECT COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN A.star = 5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS star5Count, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN A.star = 4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS star4Count, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN A.star = 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS star3Count, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN A.star = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS star2Count, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN A.star = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS star1Count, COALESCE(COUNT(*), 0) AS totalCount FROM feedback A

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT A.cum_id FROM feedback A JOIN ( SELECT cum_id, MAX(create_date) AS max_dt FROM feedback GROUP BY cum_id ) B ON A.cum_id = B.cum_id AND A.create_date = B.max_dt WHERE A.star = #{star} ) t

SELECT C.id AS customerId, C.customer_code AS customerCode, C.name AS customerName, A.star AS star, A.create_date AS createDate FROM feedback A JOIN ( SELECT cum_id, MAX(create_date) AS max_dt FROM feedback GROUP BY cum_id ) B ON A.cum_id = B.cum_id AND A.create_date = B.max_dt JOIN customer C ON C.id = A.cum_id WHERE A.star = #{star} ORDER BY A.create_date DESC, C.id DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT B.id AS segmentId, B.name AS segmentName, COUNT(A.id) AS customerCount FROM customer A JOIN segment B ON B.id = A.segment_id WHERE A.is_deleted = 'N' GROUP BY B.id, B.name ORDER BY segmentId ASC
